title.rendered: Eric Dane and Rebecca Gayheart: Maybe Pregnant!

content.rendered:
Reading Time: < 1 minute

Rebecca Gayheart and Eric Dane were spotted laughing and smiling throughout a romantic stay at the San Ysidro Ranch in Montecito, Calif., last weekend.

Why so jovial after the release of the scandalous Eric Dane tape?

Because they are laid-back people who just don’t care, and the naked tape wasn’t even all that embarrassing really may be expecting a little McSteamy!

“Having a baby has been a top priority of the past six months,” reveals an insider, who says the pair has had trouble conceiving since they eloped in 2004.

Life & Style says Rebecca is 3-4 months pregnant right now. While we don’t believe that necessarily at all, the couple has talked about having kids a lot.

It takes more than a naked tape to faze these free spirits.

Gayheart turned down the role of Penn Badgley and Taylor Momsen’s mom on Gossip Girl because it was based in New York City and she didn’t want to be away from Eric or travel that far, according to a source close to the couple.

“It was bad for her health,” the insider says. “She’s also turned down a Hallmark movie and a Lifetime movie because she was trying to have a baby.”

We just hope they don’t name it Kari Ann. As for the Grey’s Anatomy hunk? You can see him on Season 6 of that program starting September 24.
